p: On healthy kelp, microbial community structure (identity and relative abundances) and composition (identity only) generally differed between temperature treatments at the start (day 8; figure 1 a, d) and end (day 31; figure 1 c, f) of the experiment, although no significant differences were found at day 16 ( figure 1 b, e; electronic supplementary material, table S4). Acidification significantly affected microbial community composition at the start of the experiment (day 8; figure 1 d; electronic supplementary material, table S4).
